item.title: About me
item.description: Data ninja makes data tidy again with powerful open source tools. Here is the guy behind the data ninja.

item.title: Spacemacs
item.description: Installation Windows Linux Configuration Set your dotfile to ~/spacemacs.d/-folder. You can syncronize your dotfiles between computers and have your own setup up and running just syncing this folder. Vim Bindings Search Movements gg first line G last line Ctrl b Ctrl u Ctrl d Ctrl f k j h l f F t T 0 w W e E O o enter insert mode i before cursor I begin of line a append cursor A end of line O previous line o next line s sustitute character s substitute line (same as cc) c substitute end of line
